This is the site for the courses Bio4158/Bio5158  at the University of Ottawa.
You will find all the course information including the course schedule, slides, course notes, practicals info and exercises, description of assessments as well as the (official) syllabus for the course.

Submission of course work is done via [brighspace](https://uottawa.brightspace.com/d2l/home).

## Teaching team {{< fa person-chalkboard >}}

- Julien Martin ([email](people.qmd)) 



### Teaching assistants



- Lydia Yu ([email](mailto:lyu047@uottawa.ca))

## Office hours {{< fa clock >}}

Meetings will be in-person or online using zoom.
Please consult the TA's first for questions related to the lab exercises and assignments.



- **Julien Martin**: Monday 1430-1530 (in-person & online) 
- **Lydia Yu**: TBA (in-person) 
- **Wyeth Blumberg**: TBA (in-person) 



## Schedule {{< fa calendar-days >}}



- Lectures
   -  Mondays, 1300-1420 in SMD-425 
   -  Wednesdays, 1130-1250 in SMD-224 
 - Practicals
   -  Wednesdays, 1430-1720 in MNT-141/142 



There are no lectures or tutorials during reading week.

Mid-term will be during the lab following reading week.

Final exam will be during exam week.



# Software and account requirements

* [`R`][cran] version 4.0.0 or higher

* a R IDE: [`RStudio`][rstudio_d] or [`VSCode`][vscode_d]

* [`quarto`][quarto_install] software is strongly recommended
